begin.description: Groups a set of lines together, for use with DORAND and DOSWITCH statements.

dorand.description: Executes a random line of code within the block.

doswitch.description: Executes the specified line of code within the block.

for.description: Loops through the block of code

forcharlayer.description: Loops through all items that a character has equipped on a specified layer.

forcharmemorytype.description: Loops through all memory items on a character that have one of the specified flags.

forchars.description: Loops through all characters within distance tiles.

forclients.description: Loops through all connected clients within distance tiles.

forcont.description: Loops through all items inside a container.

forcontid.description: Loops through all items inside a container with a specified BASEID
